sub_title: Tax Lawyer | LL.M International Tax | Tax Law Graduate Diploma | LL.M Corporate Law | LL.B
summary: A highly motivated and enthusiastic international tax lawyer with education and work experience on three continents. Specializing in indirect taxes of the digital economy and new technologies, with expertise in collaborating with clients in the software, streaming, video games, SaaS, IaaS, PaaS, cloud, checkout, and online education industries. Demonstrated the ability to produce high-quality research related to tax law, with twenty scientific tax law publications and tax opinion columns in a regular newspaper. Always curious and eager for new knowledge.
